heading: Investigation of applicant
text:
Every applicant for a license or certificate of competence shall submit to investigation as
directed by a governmental entity in order to determine the applicantâ€™s character and fitness. The applicant shall furnish the
department with payment for the actual cost of conducting the background investigation. Failure to provide all requested and
completed documents or any other information necessary for completion of the investigation in a timely fashion will constitute an
incomplete application and will result in a denial of the license or certificate of competence.
